Hey folks, this web site provides some information about my activities in data science using R.
I have a Masters degree in Plant Biotechnology with focus on Biostatistics. I earned a PhD at the Institute of Biostatistics at the Leibniz University of Hannover. During my studies I started learning R and wrote some small packages stored on my GitHub page. This blog will showcase some of the analyses I have been doing with different data sets.
In addition I propagate and cultivate Bonsai trees for several years. Within this blog I want to document the development of some of my favorite trees.
